snippet: Miami’s Goran Dragic scored 26 points and Dwyane Wade had 7 of his 24 in overtime after a halfcourt shot by Toronto’s Kyle Lowry’s had tied the score at the buzzer.
abstract: Basketball Roundup; Miami Heat beat Toronto Raptors, 102-96; other pro basketball news noted.
lead_paragraph: Miami’s Goran Dragic scored 26 points and Dwyane Wade had 7 of his 24 in overtime after a halfcourt shot by Toronto’s Kyle Lowry’s had tied the score at the buzzer.

headline.main: Heat Prevail in Overtime After Raptors Tie Game at Buzzer
headline.print_headline: Heat Prevail in Overtime After Raptors Tie Game at Buzzer
